translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality🔽The Conditional Relations in brief

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.57. Sanidassanattika, Atītārammaṇattika🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naatītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naanāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika atīta ārammaṇa ttika  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na atīta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ atīta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na anāgata ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ anāgata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With object visible, etc.: With object visible, with object past, etc.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na paccuppanna ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ paccuppanna ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
